Title: Windows setup & configuration made fast & easy with WinGet | BRK335
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Learn how WinGet is eliminating the toil associated with configuration management. One of the most frustrating experiences for developers and challenges for IT Professionals is getting a Windows environment set up correctly. WinGet now has support for Microsoft Desired State Configuration. The ability to export your configuration makes it easy to get a great starting place to build configuration files to solve problems with getting Windows setup.

Delivered in a silent stage breakout.
